channel.title: Adding,yell command,server panel,and Making donators recognized
channel.description:
Alright well what i was wondering was;
#1 on a deltascape source how do i add ::adminyell ::modyell command, #2 how could i add something to the server source so that it would add like "update time 2mins" or just have text announce it to all users. #3 you know how you edit rights for a user to like 1,2,3 how could i add a 4 to that and make it so donators have a special icon next to there name?

item.title: Adding,yell command,server panel,and Making donators recognized
item.dc:creator: @jokerr jokerr
item.description:
@jokerr wrote:

Yeah no idea for any of those
and also,thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Adding,yell command,server panel,and Making donators recognized
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

jGod:

#'s 1 2 and 3 … learn Java.

Don’t be an idiot.

On Topic:

  1. You could just make it so that if the player’s rights is 1, then [Moderator] would be in front of the message, and the same for player rights 2. (Create two else statements.)
  2. You mean like a yell?
  3. Not sure, client sided also, because of the new crown.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding,yell command,server panel,and Making donators recognized
